concept.title: Field Path Expressions
concept.shortdesc: You can use field path expressions in certain processors to determine the set of fields that you want the processor to use.

conbody.p: expression languagefield path expressionsfield path expressionsoverviewFor example, you want to use the Field Remover processor to remove all fields that start with the same prefix. Instead of manually entering each field name, you can use a field path expression to specify the fields to remove.
